forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers this morning, then cloudy skies with more rain likely during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers this morning...overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain likely. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of rain early. Low 8C. Winds ENE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with rain ending overnight. Low 47F. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.
